subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Andy Murray beat third-seeded Mikhail Youzhny, 6-2, 5-7, 7-6 (1), to advance to the final of the St. Petersburg Open in Russia. Murray will play sixth-seeded Fernando Verdasco, who defeated the qualifier Marin Cilic, 6-2, 6-3.
snippet: Second-seeded Andy Murray beat third-seeded Mikhail Youzhny, 6-2, 5-7, 7-6 (1), to advance to the final of the St. Petersburg Open in Russia. Murray will play sixth-seeded Fernando Verdasco, who defeated the qualifier Marin Cilic, 6-2, 6-3.
